headline: Ohio Senate Primary Tests Trump Influence With Republican Voters
author: John McCormick
sentences:

The Republican U.S. Senate primary in Ohio on Tuesday will test former President Donald Trumps influence over GOP voters in a race that has showcased the combative brand of conservatism he helped inject into the party.
